name: react-ssr-starter
description: Starter package for server side rendering with React and Redux

scripts.build: yarn run build:client && yarn run build:server
scripts.build:client: rm -rf Client && babel src -d Client --copy-files --ignore Server.js,views/* && mv Client/Client.js Client/index.js
scripts.build:server: rm -rf Server && babel src -d Server --copy-files --ignore Client.js && mv Server/Server.js Server/index.js
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf Server && rm -rf Client && rm -rf example/node_modules && rm -rf example/build

author: Emanuele Longo
